title: MOVING
SOCIETY
FORWARD
header.subtitle: Secure domestic drone that supports the future

title: THE POWER TO ADVANCE
JAPAN'S INFRASTRUCTURE
outline.subtitle: The Power to Evolve Japan's Social Infrastructure.
content: 'Eyes' that make the space
closer and freer to the sky
that we want to deliver...
Some...
Some...
Some...
We have created it with the hope
that people will be able
to work closely and be supported
in order to achieve economic growth
with a sense of satisfaction.
Drones are partners who bring safety and efficiency
to your business and give you time to improve the future.
A domestic drone optimized by combining all technologies
such as control, body, communication,
camera, propeller, and security.
Your new partner will be born.
Welcome
